oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Road construction crew
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans; Road construction workers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of a road construction crew, 6 mules, and work wagons.
This photograph shows an African American road crew building roads in Chattanooga, Tennessee, likely at the beginning of the 20th century.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Reproduction permitted for non-profit educational and research purposes only. All reproductions require acknowledgement of the contributing institution. For research inquiries about specific objects, contact the Chattanooga History Center.
